Issue.summary: I want to be able to get info on the channels object of my NetworkConfig
Issue.description: ): List, List, chaincodes . For example the object below: "channels":{ "foo":{ "orderers": "orderer.example.com" , "peers":{ "peer0.org1.example.com":{ "endorsingPeer":true, "chaincodeQuery":true, "ledgerQuery":true, "eventSource":true }, "peer1.org1.example.com":{ "endorsingPeer":true, "chaincodeQuery":true, "ledgerQuery":true, "eventSource":false } }, "chaincodes": "example02:v1", "marbles:1.0" } } >
